sentences.en: And I HAs tried to apprehend the Pythagorean power by which bulk holds above the flux.
sentences.cn: 我试图领悟毕达哥拉斯所景仰的数字力量,它支配着此消彼长.

sentences.en: And I have tried to apprehend the Pythagorean power by which away above the flux.
sentences.cn: 我试图领悟毕达哥拉斯所景仰的数字力量,它支配着此消彼涨.

sentences.en: And I have tried to apprehend the Pythagorean power by which number holds above the flux.
sentences.cn: 我曾试图理解毕达哥拉斯的力量,这种力量使数字凌驾于万物之上.

sentences.en: And I have tried to apprehend the Pythagorean power by which number holds sway above the flux.
sentences.cn: 我试图领悟毕达哥拉斯所景仰的数字力量,它支配著此消彼长。

sentences.en: And I have tried to apprehend the Pythagorean power by which number holds sway above the flux.
sentences.cn: 我试图领悟毕达哥拉斯所景仰的数字力量，它支配着此消彼涨。

sentences.en: And I have tried to apprehend the Pythagorean power by with number above the flux.
sentences.cn: 我试图理解毕达哥拉斯的威力,它让数字支配潮涨.

sentences.en: And I have tried to the Pythagorean 7 power by which number holds sway above the flux.
sentences.cn: 我还试图弄懂毕达哥拉斯学说,它认为数是高居于感性流变之上的永恒力量.

sentences.en: I have tried to apprehend the Pythagorean power by which number holds sway above the flux.
sentences.cn: 我力图领悟毕达哥拉斯的才能,他的才能使数字支配着不断变动的事物.

sentences.en: I have wished to know why the stars shine.And I have tried to apprehend the Pythagorean power by which number holds sway above the flux. A little of this, but not much, I have achieved.
sentences.cn: 我怀着同样的激情去寻找知识，我曾渴望着理解人心，我曾渴望知道为何星星会闪烁，我还企图弄懂毕达哥拉斯所谓的用数字控制变化的力量，但在这方面，我只知道一点点。

sentences.en: In this paper, we find all Pythagorean numbers in the complex quadratic field with class - number two.
sentences.cn: 摘要本文中求出所有类数为2的二次代数复数体的毕氏数.

sentences.en: The method of deducing Pythagorean Triples ( irreducible and reducible ) is explained.
sentences.cn: 并说明了互素勾 股数 组的导出方法.

sentences.en: The numbers of the Pythagorean Lambdoma are 1, 1, 1,1 an 1, 2, 3, 4.
sentences.cn: 毕达哥拉斯的蓝道玛是1, 1,1, 1和1, 2, 3, 4.
